H0.text: For which film did Tatum O'Neal receive the Best Supporting Actress 'Oscar'. The Bad News Bears

H1.text: For which film did Tatum O'Neal receive the Best Supporting Actress 'Oscar'. International Velvet

H2.text: For which film did Tatum O'Neal receive the Best Supporting Actress 'Oscar'. Little Darlings

H3.text: For which film did Tatum O'Neal receive the Best Supporting Actress 'Oscar'. A Paper Moon

A4.text: Tatum O'Neal won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress, making her the youngest competitive Academy Award winner as of 2025 (at age 10).

A5.text: Tatum O'Neal received widespread praise from critics for her performance as Addie, earning her the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress.
